A city that exists only in the minds of its inhabitants, built entirely of memories and experiences.
A city that appears only when it rains, its buildings and streets materializing out of the water.
A cityed entirely of light, where every building and object glows with a soft, ethereal light.
A city that is constantly in a state of flux, its architecture and layout constantly changing and evolving.
A city that is entirely made of sound, where buildings and streets are created by the collective voices and sounds of its inhabitants.
